content: here is my crochet pattern for a beautiful reusable honeycomb wash cloth the pattern is in us crochet terms you can find a free version on my blog https //clairesmadeit com/honeycomb-wash-cloth-free-crochet-pattern/ but if you would prefer to purchase an ad-free printer friendly professionally designed pdf version including extra photos and a crochet chart you can buy it here on ravelry i used most of a ball of scheepjes cotton 8 in ochre and a small amount in light grey for the border you will also need a needle and scissors for sewing in the ends my completed wash cloth measures approx 25cm x 28cm gauge is not critical for this design but you may use more or less yarn depending on your gauge i hope you enjoy the pattern and if you share your finished items on instagram i d love to see them - you can tag me clairesmadeit
